subject: Counting junit test failures/errors
msgSnippet: Any suggestions on how I might count the total number of test failures and errors in a build in order to fail the build at a certain threshold rather than more
messageBody:
Any suggestions on how I might count the total number of test failures and
errors in a build in order to fail the build at a certain threshold rather
than more 0 failures?



The <junit> task seems to only set a fail/error property and not the number
of failures in a test case.



Thanks.



Greg.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
